contentrichtext.text: :''for the cemetery see [[Zorgvlied (cemetery)]]'' <!-- Main article coordinate --> {{Coord|52|55|N|6|15|E|type:city(410)|display=title}} {{Infobox settlement |name = Zorgvlied |coordinates_display = inline |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = Drenthe |subdivision_type2 = Municipality |subdivision_name2 = Westerveld |image_map = LocatieWesterveld.png |image_map1 = Map NL - Westerveld - Zorgvlied.png |map_caption1 = The village (dark red) and the statistical district (light green) of Zorgvlied in the municipality of Westerveld. |image_map_size = 250 |map_caption = |population = ca. 160 |wapen= |area_km2 = |postal_code = }} '''Zorgvlied''' is a town in the [[Netherlands|Dutch]] province of [[Drenthe]]. It is a part of the municipality of [[Westerveld]], and lies about 23 km west of [[Assen]]. The statistical area "Zorgvlied", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 410.<ref name="CBS2">Statistics Netherlands (CBS), [http://statline.cbs.nl/ ''Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005'']. As of 1 January 2005.</ref> ==References== <!--This article uses the Cite.php citation mechanism. If you would like more information on how to add references to this article, please see http://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Cite/Cite.php --> <references/> {{Westerveld-town}} [[Category:Populated places in Drenthe]] {{Drenthe-geo-stub}}
